SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Game

Class Manuscript

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Game.Manuscript
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientManuscript, Serializable
public class Manuscript extends Object implements Serializable, ClientManuscript
This class represents the manuscript or playing field of a player in the game.
See Also:
